title: Does vertical mobility apply for a sem or a year?
content: I m in 3rd sem Cse. Lets say i have more than 24 credits backlog. Wont i be promoted to next sem(4th) based on vertical mobility?

comments.body: No you won't be, you need to clear em.
But its the same year(2nd). I thought  it works when we transfer from one year to the next
Yes u are right. Sorry for my confusion. U need to clear it by 4th sem end of u can't proceed to fifth. Clear it ASAP.
